name: Large Black Folding Camera
description:
This beautiful folding camera with bellows has absolutely no markings other than the markings on the lens which read ERKOS ANASTIGMAS "FOTAR" 1:6,3 F=13,5 CM. NR.120411. I have checked the back of the camera, the front plate and the handle to see if I could find any information but could not even locate a patent date.

This camera has not been film tested but I did not see any light leaks when I looked through the bellows.
